title: Glorious colour
creator_credit: Anne James Productions and Anne James
brief_description: Glorious Colour is a five, half hour program series on Kaffe Fassett, Artist/Designer working in the threefold areas of painting, knitting and needlepoint. Program 1- Introduction: at home. Program 2- Painting and knitting-studies Program 3- Developing colour sense Program 4- The knitters’ workshop Program 5- Textile Designing-Conclusions
